name: All You Can Fit
description:
We are an enthusiast italian team of 5 newcomers of the game industry.

We partecipated to Epic Mega Jam 2021 in the awareness that Italy is excluded from the contest. We wanted to challenge ourselves in our first jam using Unreal, and try out the new features of Unreal Engine 5.

The jam theme was "Running out of space". In this game you must survive hordes of waiters and too-much-filling sushi. Your girlfriend ordered a lot in an all-you-can eat sushi restaurant, and then ditched you leaving you on your own. Your goal is to get rid of the extra food your stomach can't hold anymore.Unfortunately the game is unfinished and still in development, and we will bring it on soon.

We uploaded a demo so you can test the mechanics we designed.

Use mouse to drag food from your plates to some customer's one.
